item.title: Sunny Sunday, Still Hot and Dry
item.description: Thunderstorm chances increase Wednesday through Friday

item.title: Farmer’s Market Sunday Forecast
item.description: Our “Feels Like” temps could climb to 110°! An isolated thunderstorm is possible in the early afternoon

item.title: Emails show DeSantis administration blindsided county officials with plans for ‘Alligator Alcatraz’
item.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis’ administration left many local officials in the dark about the immigration detention center that rose from an isolated airstrip in the Everglades.

item.title: Fire at boat storage facility in Charlotte County
item.description: Saturday at around 11a.m charlotte county officials were dispatched to a fire at a boat storage facility on Appleton Blvd.

item.title: Heat continues Monday, rain chances to increase midweek
item.description: A northwest wind off the Gulf will help keep things a little cooler than Saturday and Sunday, but expect afternoon high temperatures to still reach the low to mid-90s.

item.title: Florida ranks #1 for religious liberty in the U.S., Governor Ron DeSantis says
item.description: Florida was named the new number one state in the nation when it comes to protecting spiritual freedoms as part of The Religious Liberty in The United States 2025 annual report.

item.title: Deodorant sold by Walmart, Amazon recalled nationwide
item.description: The FDA recommends discarding recalled products or returning them to the retailer where they were purchased.

item.title: 3 people are still missing from deadly July 4 floods in Texas county, down from nearly 100
item.description: The announcement comes after people who had previously been reported missing have since been accounted for.

item.title: Myakka City neighbors oppose new development
item.description: A community strategy meeting was held where they could learn about the new development and how to speak out when it comes to official commission meetings.

item.title: Commercial pilot makes ‘aggressive maneuver’ to avoid mid-air collision with Air Force B-52 bomber
item.description: A Delta pilot made an “aggressive maneuver” to avoid a mid-air collision with a U.S. Air Force B-52 bomber.

item.title: Hot again today with better rain chances this week
item.description: Hot with rain on the way
